pkgmetadata.longdescription: Guan is an open-source python package developed and maintained by https://www.guanjihuan.com/about (Ji-Huan Guan, 关济寰). The primary location of this package is on website https://py.guanjihuan.com. The GitHub location of this package is on https://github.com/guanjihuan/py.guanjihuan.com.
